section.title: Windows
section.para: A Windows version of Git can be found on the Git download page . This website provides native installers for each operating system. The homepage of the Windows Git project is git for window .

section.title: Mac OS
section.para: The easiest way to install Git on a Mac is via the Git download page and to download and run the installer for Mac OS X.
Git is also installed by default with the Apple Developer Tools on Mac OS X.
